CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select bil_billpositions.PositionValue_IncludingTax, bil_billpositions.External_PositionReferenceField As VorgangsNummer, bil_billpositions.External_PositionType, bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.TransmitionCode, bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.PrimaryComment, bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.SecondaryComment, bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.TransmittedOnDate, bil_billpositions.BIL_BillPositionID, bil_billpositions.External_PositionCode As GPOS From bil_billposition_2_patienttreatment Inner Join bil_billpositions On bil_billposition_2_patienttreatment.BIL_BillPosition_RefID = bil_billpositions.BIL_BillPositionID And bil_billpositions.IsDeleted = 0 And bil_billpositions.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID Inner Join bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses On bil_billpositions.BIL_BillPositionID = bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.BillPosition_RefID And bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.IsDeleted = 0 And bil_billposition_transmitionstatuses.IsActive = 1 Where bil_billposition_2_patienttreatment.IsDeleted = 0 And bil_billposition_2_patienttreatment.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And bil_billposition_2_patienttreatment.HEC_Patient_Treatment_RefID = @TreatmentID
